name: Athletics
description: Covers climbing, jumping, swimming, and raw physical feats.

name: Acrobatics
description: Tumbling, balancing, and feats of bodily coordination.

combatActions.name: Tumble
combatActions.description: move through an enemy's threatened area without provoking an attack of opportunity

combatActions.name: Kip-Up
combatActions.description: stand up from a prone position as a free action

name: Heavy Weapons
description: Proficiency with large, two-handed weapons like greatswords, mauls, and greataxes.

combatActions.name: Cleave
combatActions.description: after felling an opponent, you may immediately make an attack against another adjacent opponent

name: Light Blades
description: Precision fighting with daggers, shortswords, and rapiers.

combatActions.name: Precise Strike
combatActions.description: you can target a specific weak point to ignore a portion of the enemy's armor

name: Overwhelm
description: The art of breaking guards and shattering defenses with pure force.

combatActions.name: Sunder
combatActions.description: you can make attacks that specifically target and reduce the effectiveness of an opponent's armor or shield

name: Clairvoyance
description: The discipline of perceiving events and locations beyond your physical senses.

combatActions.name: Third Eye
combatActions.description: you can see invisible creatures and objects

name: Academics
description: Knowledge of historical events, scientific principles, and cultural studies.

name: Bearing
description: Carrying yourself with confidence and establishing natural authority.

combatActions.name: Hold Gaze
combatActions.description: Make a Bearing check to stare down a non-hostile creature, preventing it from approaching.

name: Breathing Control
description: The ability to hold your breath for extended periods and regulate oxygen intake.

name: Concentration
description: Maintaining focus on a task, spell, or ability despite distractions.

name: Discipline
description: Resisting mental and emotional influence through sheer force of will.

name: Dodge
description: The ability to evade attacks through quick movements and reflexes.

name: Etiquette
description: Knowing and applying correct social graces in various cultural contexts.

combatActions.name: De-escalate
combatActions.description: Make an Etiquette check to attempt to talk down a hostile but intelligent creature before combat begins.

name: Fortitude
description: Resisting poison, disease, and other physical ailments.

name: Insight
description: Sensing moods, reading body language, and detecting emotional tells.

combatActions.name: Read Intent
combatActions.description: Make an Insight check to determine if an opponent is about to flee, surrender, or press the attack.

name: Investigation
description: Finding clues, noticing details, and solving puzzles through logical deduction.

name: Labor
description: Performing tasks that require sustained physical exertion.

name: Logic
description: The ability to reason, solve complex problems, and make sound judgments.

name: Lore (Field)
description: Specialized knowledge in a specific field, such as 'Monster Lore' or 'Arcane Lore'.

name: Pain Tolerance
description: The ability to endure physical pain and continue functioning.

name: Perception
description: Noticing details in your environment using your senses.

name: Performance
description: Captivating an audience through music, acting, or oratory.

combatActions.name: Distracting Performance
combatActions.description: Make a Performance check to create a diversion, giving allies a bonus to their Stealth checks.

name: Persuasion
description: Convincing others through reasoned argument, kindness, and compassion.

combatActions.name: Plea for Mercy
combatActions.description: When an opponent is defeated, you can use Persuasion to convince your allies to show mercy.

name: Running
description: The ability to run for long distances without tiring.

name: Sleight of Hand
description: Performing acts of manual dexterity, such as pickpocketing or magic tricks.

name: Swimming
description: The ability to move through water effectively.

name: Tinkering
description: Disarming traps, repairing simple mechanisms, and jury-rigging devices.

name: Vigor
description: The ability to push your body beyond its normal limits.

name: Improvised Weapons
description: Using everyday objects as effective weapons.

name: Polearms
description: Fighting with spears, halberds, and other long-hafted weapons.

name: Whips & Chains
description: Using flexible weapons to trip, disarm, or attack at a short distance.

name: Dual Wielding
description: Fighting with a weapon in each hand.

name: Thrown Weapons
description: Using daggers, axes, and other weapons designed to be thrown.

name: Crossbows
description: Proficiency with light, heavy, and hand crossbows.

name: Shields
description: Using a shield to defend against attacks.

name: Hammers & Maces
description: Proficiency with blunt weapons.

name: Brawling
description: Unarmed combat using fists, feet, and grappling.

name: Axes
description: Proficiency with battleaxes, handaxes, and greataxes.

name: Exotic Weapons
description: Proficiency with rare and unusually shaped weapons.

name: Firearms
description: Proficiency with pistols, rifles, and other black-powder weapons.

name: Siege Weapons
description: Operating catapults, ballistae, and trebuchets.

name: Traps
description: Setting and disarming mechanical and natural traps.

name: Bows
description: Proficiency with shortbows and longbows.

name: Slings
description: Using a sling to hurl projectiles with surprising force.

name: Weapon Flourish
description: Using stylish and intimidating weapon movements.

name: Mindful Archery
description: A meditative practice of archery focusing on precision and calm.

name: Dazzling Display
description: A performance of weapon skill meant to demoralize opponents.

name: Commander's Arms
description: Skill with the traditional weapons of a commanding officer.

name: Subduing Strikes
description: Techniques to incapacitate foes without causing lethal harm.

name: Disarming Blow
description: Targeted attacks to knock a weapon from an opponent's grasp.

name: Armor Spikes
description: Dealing damage to grappling opponents with armor spikes.

name: Powerful Build
description: Being considered one size larger for carrying capacity and weapon size.

name: Endure
description: Pushing through pain and exhaustion while wearing heavy armor.

name: Second Skin
description: Reducing the penalties for sleeping in armor.

name: Light Armor Evasion
description: Improved dodging capabilities while wearing light armor.

name: Acrobatic Armor
description: Reducing armor check penalties for acrobatic movements.

name: Armor Maintenance
description: Keeping armor in top condition for maximum protection.

name: Custom Fit
description: Modifying armor to better suit your body, reducing penalties.

name: Heavy Armor Bracing
description: Using heavy armor to resist being moved or knocked prone.

name: Tower Shield Use
description: Wielding massive shields that provide near-total cover.

name: Forced March
description: Traveling long distances in armor without becoming fatigued.

name: Tireless Sentinel
description: Staying alert and watchful for extended periods in armor.

name: Armor History
description: Knowledge of famous armors and their wearers.

name: Material Science
description: Understanding the properties of materials used in armor.

name: Armor Modification
description: Applying non-magical upgrades to armor.

name: Layering
description: Effectively wearing multiple layers of light armor.

name: Find the Gaps
description: Intuitively knowing where to strike an armored foe.

name: Situational Awareness
description: Maintaining perception of the battlefield despite armor's limitations.

name: Unflinching
description: Resisting fear and intimidation through sheer willpower.

name: Consecrated Armor
description: Imbuing armor with divine or spiritual protection.

name: Regal Bearing
description: Projecting an aura of authority while in fine armor.

name: Dread Visage
description: Making your helmet and armor appear more intimidating.

name: Comfortable Fit
description: Being so accustomed to your armor it feels like a second skin.

name: Protective Instinct
description: Using your armored body to shield allies from harm.

name: Acclimatization
description: Adapting to harsh environmental conditions.

name: Adrenaline Control
description: Gaining a temporary boost to physical abilities in stressful situations.

name: Animal Handling
description: Taming, training, and building strong bonds with wild animals.

combatActions.name: Calm Beast
combatActions.description: Attempt to calm a hostile but non-magical beast, potentially ending combat.

name: Bargaining
description: High-stakes negotiation, diplomacy, and making binding deals.

combatActions.name: Negotiate Truce
combatActions.description: Attempt to persuade intelligent enemies to stop fighting in exchange for something.

name: Breaching
description: Forcibly opening locked doors and breaking down walls.

name: Cartography
description: Creating accurate maps of explored areas.

name: Command
description: Giving direct orders that allies or underlings are compelled to follow.

combatActions.name: Rally
combatActions.description: Allow an ally to reroll a failed fear check.

combatActions.name: Direct Ally
combatActions.description: Grant an ally an immediate extra move action.

name: Craft (Field)
description: Expertise in a specific craft, such as 'Blacksmithing' or 'Alchemy'.

name: Deception
description: Weaving complex lies and maintaining elaborate false identities.

combatActions.name: Feint
combatActions.description: Make a Deception check opposed by Insight; success grants a bonus to your next attack.

name: Escape Artistry
description: Slipping out of bindings, grapples, and confinement.

name: Intimidation
description: Coercing others through physical presence and implied threats.

combatActions.name: Demoralize
combatActions.description: Impose a penalty on a target's attack rolls through an opposed Intimidation vs. Willpower check.

name: Iron Gut
description: Consuming and resisting the effects of spoiled or toxic substances.

name: Kinesis (Arcane)
description: Moving small objects with your mind through arcane power.

name: Lockpicking
description: Opening mechanical locks without a key.

name: Medicine
description: Diagnosing illnesses, treating wounds, and stabilizing the dying.

name: Meditation
description: Achieving a state of deep focus for mental recovery or clarity.

name: Nature
description: Knowledge of plants, animals, and natural ecosystems.

name: Pursuit
description: Chasing down fleeing targets over long distances.

name: Research
description: Finding specific information in libraries, archives, and other sources.

name: Resilience
description: The ability to recover from physical and mental hardship.

name: Stealth
description: For moving silently, hiding effectively, and remaining unseen.

combatActions.name: Hide
combatActions.description: as an action, make a Stealth check to become hidden if you have cover

combatActions.name: Sneak Attack
combatActions.description: if you attack from hiding, you gain a bonus to your attack and damage roll

name: Survival
description: Finding food, water, and shelter in the wilderness.

name: Tactics
description: Understanding battlefield positioning, strategy, and command.

name: Tracking
description: Following trails and identifying the passage of creatures.

name: Stalwart Defense
description: A defensive posture that makes you nearly impossible to move.

name: Flowing Evasion
description: A fluid, evasive fighting style that relies on dodging and weaving.

name: Targeted Strike
description: Aiming for specific weak points to bypass armor and inflict critical injuries.

name: Unbreakable Body
description: A conditioning technique that makes your body as hard as iron.

name: Relentless Pursuit
description: The ability to chase down any foe, no matter how fast or evasive.

name: Anatomical Lore
description: Knowing the vital points and weaknesses of various creatures.

name: Battlefield Tactics
description: Mastery of small-unit tactics and battlefield control.

name: Combat Intuition
description: An almost precognitive sense of an opponent's next move.

name: Weapon Bond
description: A mystical connection to a specific weapon, allowing you to call it to hand.

name: Warlord's Presence
description: An inspiring and terrifying presence on the battlefield.

name: Reactive Stance
description: A combat style focused on counter-attacks and exploiting enemy openings.

name: Psychokinetic Force
description: Applying telekinetic force to move, lift, or crush objects and creatures.

name: Psychometabolism
description: Controlling your body's functions to heal wounds, resist toxins, and enter a state of suspended animation.

name: Mental Celerity
description: Accelerating your perception of time to grant yourself supernatural speed and reflexes.

name: Psychic Surgery
description: Using fine telekinetic control to manipulate living tissue, mending wounds or causing precise injuries.

name: Biokinesis
description: Altering your own biological structure to grow claws, gain natural armor, or adapt to environments.

name: Adrenal Surge
description: Pushing your body's physical limits through psionic stimulation.

name: Mind Palace
description: Constructing a vast mental library to store and perfectly recall information.

name: Metacreativity
description: Creating complex objects and structures out of pure psionic energy.

name: Telepathy
description: Communicating directly with the minds of others.

name: Aura Projection
description: Projecting your psionic presence to inspire awe or terror.

name: Emotional Projection
description: Directly influencing the emotional state of others.

name: Arcane Might
description: Channeling raw magic to enhance physical strength.

name: Runic Warding
description: Inscribing protective runes on your body or equipment.

name: Aeromancy
description: Controlling wind and weather to create gusts, fog, or lightning.

name: Artifice
description: Creating magical items, constructs, and enchantments.

name: Terramancy
description: Shaping earth and stone to create walls, pits, or projectiles.

name: Chronomancy
description: Manipulating time to slow enemies, hasten allies, or glimpse the future.

name: Arcane Lore
description: Deep knowledge of magical theory, history, and artifacts.

name: Symbology
description: Understanding and using magical symbols, glyphs, and wards.

name: Divination
description: Gaining knowledge through magical scrying, prophecy, and insight.

name: Geomancy
description: Drawing power from ley lines and the natural world to fuel your magic.

name: Evocation
description: Creating powerful blasts of elemental energy.

name: Abjuration
description: Protective magic that creates barriers, dispels enchantments, and banishes creatures.

name: World-Spirit Bond
description: Drawing on the raw power of the world spirit for physical might.

name: Enduring Spirit
description: A connection to ancient, unyielding spirits that grants immense fortitude.

name: Wild Hunt
description: Channeling the spirit of the predator to move with supernatural speed and grace.

name: Fetish Crafting
description: Binding spirits into physical objects to create powerful charms and talismans.

name: Stone-Spirit Bond
description: Invoking spirits of stone and earth to grant you their resilience.

name: River-Spirit Bond
description: The tireless flow of the river spirit grants you unending stamina.

name: Lore Spirits
description: Consulting with spirits of knowledge to recall forgotten histories and lore.

name: Pattern Spirits
description: Perceiving the intricate patterns of fate and destiny woven by spirits.

name: Whispering Spirits
description: Hearing the whispers of nearby spirits, gaining insight and warnings.

name: Spirit Dominion
description: Imposing your will on spirits to command them to do your bidding.

name: Ancestor Spirits
description: Calling upon the guidance and authority of your ancestral spirits.

name: Beast Spirits
description: Communicating with and taking on the aspects of animal spirits.

name: Demolitions
description: Expertise in the use of explosives to destroy structures and obstacles.

name: Infiltration
description: Bypassing security systems and entering secure locations undetected.

name: Espionage
description: Gathering intelligence through disguise, stealth, and covert operations.

name: Masterwork Crafting
description: Creating items of exceptional quality, bordering on magical.

name: Forensics
description: Analyzing crime scenes and evidence to reconstruct events.

name: Logistics
description: Managing the supply and movement of people and resources for large-scale operations.

name: Acumen
description: Having deep, almost encyclopedic knowledge in a specific field of study.

name: Analysis
description: Breaking down complex problems and systems to understand their underlying principles.

name: Foresight
description: Predicting enemy actions and market trends through careful observation and intuition.

name: Master Plan
description: Formulating and executing complex, long-term plans.

name: Grand Deception
description: Creating and maintaining large-scale deceptions and conspiracies.

name: Spymaster
description: Running networks of spies and informants to gather intelligence.
